document_data.name: Vuhm Yestral
document_data.mainbody: '''Vuhm Yestral''' was a commander of the [[Red Plumes]] of [[Hillsfar]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Occupation of Szith Morcane|11}}
document_data.Personality: Vuhm, despite being loud and opinionated, was kind and very devoted to the citizens of Hillsfar. He had no problems with nonhumans going to the city to trade.
document_data.Relationship: Vuhm was a member of the [[Lords' Alliance]].
